meanings: v. 放弃;遗弃|n. 放任
examples: He abandoned his car in the snow.|They abandoned the project due to lack of funding.
She has the ability to solve complex problems.|His ability in mathematics is impressive.

meanings: prep. 在船上;在飞机上|adv. 上船;上飞机
examples: Welcome aboard the ship.|All passengers are now aboard.
The law was abolished in 2010.|They plan to abolish the old regulations.
Plants absorb carbon dioxide.|She absorbed all the information quickly.
